title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
EB: The first time I select an item in the outline view, it should be successfully selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.4. Attempt to select the same item again.5. Observe that the item can now be successfully selected as expected.
